罵.definition: to scold; to abuse; to curse; CL:通[tong4],頓|顿[dun4]

罵不絕口.definition: to scold without end (idiom); incessant abuse

罵人.definition: to swear or curse (at people); to scold or yell at someone

罵娘.definition: to curse (at sb); to call sb names

罵罵咧咧.definition: to swear while talking; to be foul-mouthed

罵聲.definition: scolding; tongue-lashing; (fig.) angry criticism; opprobrium; CL:片[pian4]

罵街.definition: to shout abuses in the street
